basics.name: Vinicius Sabino de Moraes
basics.label: Tech Lead, Backend engineer
basics.summary: Backend engineer for more than 15 years, with a lot of experience in PHP, Go, Node, Docker and Linux. Addicted to technology, GNU/Linux and DevOps culture. Skilled sysadmin. Trying to lead by example and always with arms and heart wide open for everyone.

work.summary: Working closely with management and the product team, I'm responsible for creating the best environment possible so my team can deliver the best solutions possible. In order to achieve this, I take part on all architecture and system design matters. My role is to enable and guide my team towards the most viable and scalable solution, always maintaining a great level of quality. My role also includes responsabilities like people development, code reviews, 1:1s, systems design and archtecture and mentorship.

During my time at Cabify, I was working as a backend engineer and, later on, as engineering manager in a finance project called Lana. Since this was a remote and distributed team, my day to day work required great comunication skills, mainly in english. I worked closely with the team in Madrid and Mexico to achieve the first version of tha Lana wallet.

Development of high performance and scalable support services for the main e-commerce and its backoffice. Working closely with the product team to deliver products related to the discount platform, fright control and the transaction system management. Technologies used: PHP, MySQL, Redis, RabbitMQ, Jenkins, Jira, Bamboo, Git, ELK, Go, Javascript, Lambda, SQS, SNS and Kinesis.
Developement of systems based on PHP, ExtJS, Symfony, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Asterisk, LDAP, Active Directory and more.
Web site traffic growth, web site UI and advertising revenue. Developed brand strategy and statistics systems, IT Consulting, Open source software consulting, PHP Instructor
Application development based on PHP, GTK+2 and MySQL
